explains: v. 努力，力争；斗争，反抗
wordGroup: strive to develop 努力发展；大力发展
strive for freedom 力争自由

sentences.en: Newspaper editors all strive to be first with a story.
sentences.cn: 报纸编辑都力争率先报道。

sentences.en: We encourage all members to strive for the highest standards.
sentences.cn: 我们鼓励所有成员为达到最高标准而努力。

sentences.en: You should always strive to achieve more, however well you have done before.
sentences.cn: 不管以前做得多么好，你应该始终争取更大的进步。
